scripts.build: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider & wp-scripts build ./src/editor.js --output-path=../../../admin/js/ & node-sass --include-path node_modules -rw src/sass/editor.scss -o ../../../admin/css & node-sass --include-path node_modules -rw src/sass/styles.scss -o ../../assets/css/blocks
scripts.dev:watch: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider & wp-scripts start ./src/editor.js --output-path=../../../admin/js/ & node-sass --include-path node_modules -rw src/sass/editor.scss -o ../../../admin/css & node-sass --include-path node_modules -rw src/sass/styles.scss -o ../../assets/css/blocks
scripts.sass:watch: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider node-sass --include-path node_modules -rw src/sass/editor.scss -o ../../../admin/css & node-sass --include-path node_modules -rw src/sass/styles.scss -o ../../assets/css/blocks
